EmailTemplate.name: Vol Event Acceptance Email
EmailTemplate.subject: You are going to {!Campaign.Portal_Title__c} on {!Campaign.StartDate}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Preferred_First_Name__c},
Your request to attend {!Campaign.Portal_Title__c} on {!Campaign.StartDate} has been accepted.
{!Campaign.Event_Acceptance_Note__c}
We look forward to seeing you there.
Kind Regards,
{!Campaign.Campaign_Owner_Name__c}
You are receiving this email as you are a registered Camp Quality Family or Volunteer. To manage your invites update your profile at www.mycampquality.org.au.
